title: Best Practice:
Filming Method
text: Mobile only creation flow
Prop your phone against a wall and film your move by following the guidelines detailed in the next slides.

title: Best Practice:
Frame Composition
text: 1 person only in the frame
Good contrast - feet must be clearly visible and distinguishable from ground
The person’s limbs are all clearly visible - avoid loose clothing

title: Best Practice:
Shooting your video
text: One continuous video - no cuts or zooming in/out during filming
Ensure the camera is stable

title: Best Practice:
Video Duration
text: Keep length of video to 1 minute max:
Emotes can only last 10 seconds max
The shorter your video, the faster the animation will be extracted

title: record VIDEO MODE
text: To make optimal use of the Editor, please upload a video featuring no more than 1 character.
The shorter your video, the faster the animation will be extracted.

title: Best Practice:
Upload video
text: Ensure your video file is not too large - lighter video files will allow for quicker processing.
Most video file formats are accepted (.mov, mp4, etc).
